sortType.name: Sort type
sortType.value: Choose type of sort (Full sort or Sort within partitions).
sortType.value1: Full sort sorts DataFrame by the specified column(s).
sortType.value2: Sort within partitions sorts each DataFrame partition by the specified column(s).
sortType.value3: The order of the output data is not guaranteed because the data is ordered on partition-level.

orderColumns.name: Order columns
orderColumns.value: Choose column(s) and sorting order (default value is asc).
orderColumns.value1: Possible sorting orders: asc, asc nulls first, asc nulls last, desc, desc nulls first, desc nulls last.
